name: Die ewige WG
description:
The eternal shared flat

--

Somebody murdered you in your bed. Now you are a ghost in your own shared flat yearning for eternal peace, but somehow you cannot find it. Maybe you have to collect some good karma to enter the afterlife? Luckily, you can now travel through time because linear time is an illusion that only mere mortals share. 

Discover what your shared flat looks like at different points in time and help the people that live there. Maybe the sticky notes can help you find out which problems there are to solve. [sticky notes not included in this version of the game]
